description: The ex-PM says the UK could exit Covid restrictions earlier if stocks were not held back for a second jab.
title: Coronavirus: Vaccinate more people with one dose, urges Tony Blair
title_page: Coronavirus: Vaccinate more people with one dose, urges Tony Blair - BBC News
maintext: "With current circumstances, I would strongly urge you to use as many first doses as you possibly can for risk groups and only after you have done all of that come back with second doses."
